name: Catching a Cheater
description:
●He is cheating on you●

～～the way to collect the evidence of affair.～～

Tap the item you think it’s proof of his affair.
You will clear the game when you find four evidences.

The manual not to be cheated on
①Don’t let him love someone.
②If he cheat on you, you should cheat on him.
These are basic rules.
